english.segment1: Baby, baby, let's get the Shepherd. Honey, honey, He's seeking you. In Luke 15, ah, do ya think that we'd lie to you?
english.segment2: Are you a little lamb? Maybe a little lost?. Get found tonight! Get found tonight!. You a little lamb? Maybe a little lost?. Get found tonight! Get found tonight!
english.segment3: Babe, babe, He'll meet you. Name the place, name the time. When sheep have left the pasture. He'll leave the 99
english.segment4: Are you a little lamb? Maybe a little lost?. Get found tonight! Get found tonight!. You a little lamb? Maybe a little lost?. Get found tonight! Get found tonight!
english.segment5: Are you a little lamb? Maybe a little lost?. Get found tonight! Get found tonight!
english.segment6: Get found, get found, get found, get found get found, tonight, baby. Get found, get found, get found, get found get found, tonight, baby..
english.segment7: Matthew 18, uh huh, I like it. Sheep, sheep, sheep -- Shepherd's looking, Shepherd's looking. Are you looking, man, are you looking, man, turn to God. Are you looking, man, are you looking, man, you must be lost!. Sheep, He's coming now, Sheep, He's coming now. He'll stop at nothing, stop at nothing, stop at... Sheep, don't go!
